title: Tata Motors ties up with LeadIT for greener future
description: Tata Motors joins the Leadership Group for Industry Transition (LeadIT), a global alliance launched by the governments of Sweden and India. This partnership allows Tata Motors to leverage global best practices, influence policy-making, and accelerate the transition towards net-zero emissions.
